disclaimer: The following content is for informational and educational purposes only. Please consult with a certified architect or relevant professionals before making any design decisions.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall / Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming space designed in Bohemian style, featuring earthy tones and eclectic decor.

rooms.name: Open Living Area
rooms.description: Combines living room and dining area with natural light. Decor includes Bohemian art, vibrant textiles, and indoor plants to promote positive energy as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom designed for relaxation with Bohemian furnishing. Located in the northeast corner to harness positive energy according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with Bohemian accents. Positioned near the master bedroom to maintain energy flow.

rooms.name: Study / Home Office
rooms.description: Functional area with minimalist Bohemian decor, ideal for work or study. Placed in the northwest section to support clarity of thought.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet Bohemian kitchen designed for ease of use. Placed in the east to harness morning energy.

rooms.name: Balcony / Veranda
rooms.description: A small transitional space connecting indoor and outdoor areas with Bohemian garden elements. Serves as a relaxation spot before the rooftop terrace.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large, inviting door with decorative elements in line with Bohemian style.

openings.name: Window Series
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light per Vastu norms.

openings.name: Rooftop Access Staircase
openings.description: Access to the rooftop terrace for relaxation and social gatherings.

vastu_note: Design considers Vastu principles by aligning room positions with cardinal directions. The master bedroom is placed in the northeast, kitchen in the east, and study/home office in the northwest. Ensure further adjustments per client's requirements and local building regulations.
bohemian_theme: The Bohemian aesthetic integrates eclectic patterns, vibrant colors, natural elements, and artistic decor to create a warm, inviting environment.
notes: All room areas are approximate estimates; the overall plan totals approximately 1000 sq ft.
Further customization may be required for individual lifestyle needs.
